name: The Floor is Lava (itch) (a_Peter)
description:
It's battle between you and your friend!

You should survive on the 30 unique islands with canons, meteorites, saws and so more!

You can shoot your friend or shred them, or launch a rocket with destruction blast to survive first!

And, of course, a LAVA IS RISING!

This game allows to play 2 or 3 person! 

Enjoy!

Controls: 

1st player: WASD and 123 for actions

2nd player: Arrows and , . / for actions

3rd player: UHJK and VBN for actions

Esc is for pause

R is for restart after battle is over
